characters.name: Lugh Tuatha Dé
alt_names: ルーグ・トウアハーデ
characters.description: The oldest son of the clan of assassins, who is often called a boy genius. He was the world's greatest assassin in his previous life, and he combines that knowledge with the magic of his new world.

characters.name: Tarte
characters.description: Lugh's personal retainer and his assassination assistant. She cares deeply for Lugh because he saved her life.

characters.name: Dia
characters.description:
A noble lady from a foreign country. She is among the strongest mages in the world.

~!She is Lugh's relative.!~

characters.name: Maha
characters.description: The proxy representative of Lugh's cosmetics brand. She provides logistical support by collecting funds, information, and more.

characters.name: Esri Tuatha Dé
alt_names: エスリ・トウアハーデ
characters.description: Lugh's adoring mother. She can be a bit of an airhead, but she's clever in her own way.

characters.name: Cian Tuatha Dé
alt_names: キアン・トウアハーデ
characters.description: Lugh's father and the strongest man in the history of the clan of assassins. He is both a loving husband and a coldhearted killer.

characters.name: Megami
characters.description:
The being that reincarnated Lugh Tuatha Dé into a different world to have him kill the hero.

~!She manipulated fate thus allowing Lugh, Maha, Tarte, and Dia to meet, with the latter three being destined to die if Lugh was never reincarnated.!~

characters.name: Lloyd
characters.description:
~!Lloyd helps to kidnap Maha.!~
~!Lloyd is one of the few characters in the show who are shown to be able to use mana.!~

characters.name: Setanta Macness
alt_names: セタンタ・マックネース
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Fighter

~!A battle harden warrior, his taste for battle is unquenchable. He is not above forsaking orders from his superiors as long as he is entertained. He abides by a respectable and chivalrous code as he was willing to give Lugh and Dia a chance to escape as long as they defeated him in battle. Despite Lugh using an under-handed tactic to win, he decided to allow them to escape by going into hiding himself, hoping that they’ll meet in battle again.!~

~!The reason behind his uncanny and superhuman strength is because he is first Squire of the Hero Epona, allowing him to share the Hero's strength. This left him with two limitations, the first being that he is not allowed to go against the Hero's orders, with the second being that he is not allowed to lose a fight, otherwise his powers would be returned, never to be given again as predetermined by the Hero's innate skill.!~

__Skills:__
~!Berserker - An S-ranked skill that increases his magic powers, attacks, defence and endurance at the cost of losing his sense of reason. After activating this ability, it would heal all of his previous sustained wounds. removing any and all superficial damage done to his body.!~
~!Unknown skill - He has a skill to counter-act his berserker skill side-effect, allowing him to maintain his composure in battle.!~

~!-He wields the divine treasure Gáe Bolg.
-Both his name and weapon are inspired by the legendary Irish Hero Cu Chulainn, famous for his ferocious fighting ability and equally infamous spear.!~

characters.name: Azba Venkaur Hakushaku
alt_names: アズバ・ヴェンカウル伯爵
characters.description: ~!Despite being the head of the Venkaur region, he wasn't very wealthy. He eventually decided to start selling military secrets in exchange for a drug known as Vizine. This made him rival the Tuatha Dé. However, the spies of the Alvan Kingdom discovered he was selling drugs and tasked Lugh Tuatha Dé to assassinate him. He completed the request.!~
